articles.description: British photographer Scott Wilson's shot of a mustang in Colorado won the Open competition, while Australian photographer Adam Ferguson bagged the Photographer of the Year title.
articles.content:
Feast your eyes on these. 
The winning photographers in the 2022 Sony World Photography Awards have been revealed - and their work is certainly gong-worthy. 
The contest, which received a staggerin… [+6696 chars]
